doc:
Sarita Choudhury https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sarita_Choudhury 0 Sarita Catherine Louise Choudhury (born 18 August 1966) is a British Indian actress, best known for her roles in the Mira Nair-directed feature films Mississippi Masala (1992), The Perez Family (1995) and Kama Sutra: A Tale of Love (1996). In the late 1990s, Choudhury added to her repertoire with supporting roles in the thriller A Perfect Murder, 3 A.M, and the John Cassavetes retread Gloria. In 2002, she starred in Just a Kiss. She played a lesbian virgin in Spike Lee's She Hate Me and acted as Anna Ran in Lady in the Water, a 2006 thriller by M. Night Shyamalan. She also played Egeria in The Hunger Games: Mockingjay part 2 and co-starred with Tom Hanks in the 2016 film A Hologram for the King. Sarita_Catherine_Louise_Choudhury ( born_18_August_1966 ) is a_British_Indian_actress , best_known for her_roles in the_Mira_Nair-directed_feature_films Mississippi_Masala ( 1992 ) , The_Perez_Family ( 1995 ) and Kama_Sutra : A_Tale of Love ( 1996 ) . In the_late_1990s , Choudhury added to her_repertoire with supporting roles in the_thriller_A_Perfect_Murder , 3_A.M , and the_John_Cassavetes_retread_Gloria . In 2002 , she starred in Just_a_Kiss . She played a_lesbian_virgin in Spike_Lee 's_She Hate Me and acted as Anna_Ran in Lady in the_Water , a_2006_thriller by M._Night_Shyamalan . She also played Egeria in The_Hunger_Games : Mockingjay_part 2 and co-starred with Tom_Hanks in the_2016_film A_Hologram for the_King .
